title: Fulbright Foreign Student Program
description: Enables graduate students, young professionals, and artists from abroad to study and conduct research in the United States.

title: Chevening Scholarships
description: Offers fully funded scholarships to pursue any master's course at any UK university.

title: DAAD Scholarships
description: Supports international students for study and research in Germany.

title: Australia Awards Scholarships
description: Long-term awards administered by the Department of Foreign Affairs and Trade.

title: Erasmus Mundus Joint Master Degrees
description: High-level integrated international study programs offered by consortia of European universities.
